hero.name: Matan Amar
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.shortDescription: Building innovative applications with modern technologies
hero.fullDescription: Software engineer with BSc in Software Engineering and hands-on experience building mobile applications, web solutions, and automation systems. Proficient in React Native and Firebase with proven ability to deliver production-ready applications. Combines technical skills with strong problem-solving abilities and leadership experience from military service. Seeking junior developer role to contribute to innovative development teams

items.title: RPA Developer
items.description: Automated workflows and data processing systems using UiPath
items.fullDescription: Designed and implemented 15+ automated workflows using UiPath, reducing manual processing time by 60% for data entry and reporting tasks. Built ETL pipelines processing 10,000+ records daily from multiple sources (Excel, databases, web services), achieving 95%+ reliability. Integrated Business Intelligence and Machine Learning tools into automation workflows for predictive analytics

items.title: Military Service
items.description: Led communications team and awarded Commander's Excellence Award for exceptional leadership

items.title: Room 8
items.fullDescription: Built cross-platform roommate matching app with Firebase Authentication and real-time synchronization. Implemented matching algorithm analyzing 15+ compatibility dimensions and integrated push notifications

items.title: Schovid
items.description: School management platform for students, parents, and teachers
items.fullDescription: Created school management platform connecting students, parents, and teachers with role-based access control. Built features for schedules, grade tracking, assignments, and messaging with responsive UI for multiple devices

items.title: Renovations
items.description: Modern business website with responsive design
items.fullDescription: Developed responsive business website with modern mobile-first design, interactive forms, and CSS Grid/Flexbox layouts

contact.title: Let's Work Together
